info.name: Lumation
info.description:
The following documentation is presented for the LumationServices S.A. test
It is practically an inventory control for supermarkets and branches, the documentation has not been fully completed due to the lack of functionalities.

item.name: Initial Process

request.description: In this system, you will start a session only by receiving the email and password parameters, in which through an access token or JWT you can obtain the user's information

This service is performed user registration for which only those who are Admin can be registered, later in the users section there will be a service to register users of type SupermarketManager and BranchManager

item.description: In the initial system there are only the two login and registration services, in addition to handling the HTTP response protocols in each of the services present.

item.name: Personal Info

request.description: This service shows the personal information of the user in which it shows both the user role information as well as the permissions that the user has enabled, this information is always obtained through the JWT.

item.description: Here is the user's personal information

item.name: Roles

request.description: In this service the information on system roles is shown, the permissions they have by role in the system are also broken down.

item.description: Here is the information on system roles

item.name: Users

request.description: This service shows the details of user information, it must be taken into account that the service returns the paged information.

This service allows adding new users, such as SupermarketManager and BranchManager. If the user is SupermarketManager, it is the one to be added, the role_id is set as 2 and the BranchManager as 0, If the BranchManager user is the one to be added, the role_id 3 and the SupermarketManager are set as 0.
This service only allows updating user data that does not affect the performance of the system.
This service allows users to be removed from the system.

item.description: The system user information management is shown here.

item.name: Supermarkets

request.description: This service shows the information of the supermarkets in the system. It is important to clarify that in order to add a branch, there must first be a supermarket

This service allows you to save information about a new supermarket in which images are stored by means of a new disk that was created on the laravel server, it was placed in public access to be able to send the information
This service shows the information of a specific supermarket
This service allows modifying the information of a supermarket

This service can update the logo of a supermarket, it is regularly done in different ways since it can always be standardized with a dropzone or javascript library to keep control of images in the system.
This service is used to remove a supermarket

item.description: The supermarkets module was tried to be maintained as the first instance of the system so that each branch can be added to existing supermarkets, in addition to which user is associated with the super market.

item.name: Supermarkets-Branch

request.description: This service shows the information of the list of branches by supermarket, which shows the information of which supermarket the branch belongs to, all the information is returned paged.

response.name: Supermarket Branch

request.description: This service allows you to store the information for a new supermarket branch, it is important to send the id of the supermarkets to which the branch will be associated

response.name: Save SupermarketBranch

request.description: This service allows you to update the information for a new supermarket branch, it is important to send the id of the super market to which the branch will be associated and a status was also added to know if the branch is to be kept active or not for a super market

response.name: Update Supermarket Branch

request.description: This service allows you to delete the information for a supermarket branch.

item.description: This module handles the information of the supermarket branches to which a user is associated and also a branch is always associated with a supermarket.

request.description: This service shows the information of the categories, always showing the paginated information
This service allows adding new categories to the system.
This service allows you to modify the categories of the system.
This service allows you to remove categories from the system.
This service allows you to display the information of the products, and to which category the products belong.

response.name: Products

request.description: This service allows adding a new product, always showing which category the product belongs to.
This service allows you to edit a new product, always showing which category the product belongs to.

This service allows you to edit the image of a product, normally an additional service is used, since a third-party library such as dropzone or another is regularly used for it UI and image management
This service allows you to remove products from the system.

This service shows the details of the information of an inventory, the association of the product and the user who is entering the information. including details of month and quantity of the product that is being entered

response.name: Inventories

request.description: This service allows adding a new a new product to inventory
This service allows you to edit an inventory item
This service allows you to remove an item from inventory
